name: WorldMaker
description:
WorldMaker enables you to create photorealistic 3D Worlds using simple drag-and-drop controls. Create Worlds using the 1200+ objects included in WorldMaker and leverage latest gen graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5 to realize your creations in real-time.



Creative iteration of a 3D World has never been easier. Create stunning exterior and interior scenes and adjust every detail of your world—including weather, lighting, character animations and poses—as if you are a god with every object of the world as your palette.



Leverage latest Unreal Engine 5 graphics in our fully customizable weather and lighting system to quickly and drastically change the mood and feel of your World.



Choose from a selection of 30+ characters to add into your world. Give them animations and custom poses to bring them to life.



Access powerful camera controls in Photo Mode to take pictures of your created Worlds with settings similar to a traditional digital camera.

Save, Load, and Share your created Worlds, and access the many prebuilt Worlds included in WorldMaker.
